about.title: About SACRART
about.description: SACRART is the premier platform for classical and contemporary sculpting education. Our mission is to preserve and teach traditional art techniques while embracing modern innovations in the field of sculpture and restoration.

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover how SACRART has transformed the artistic journey of our community members.

plans.title: Choose Your Plan
plans.subtitle: Select the perfect plan to unlock unlimited access to our exclusive sculpting and restoration content.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SACRART and our content.

video.live_description: Join Ana Rey in the process of applying gold and traditional tempera estofado techniques. Learn how to reveal underlying colors by scraping gold with millimeter precision. Ask your questions in the chat for Ana to answer in real time.
